title: Shut Up and Scribble Pt. I with Saeed Ferguson
description:
Just remember ALL CAPS when you spell the man name. Not only has the paradigm shifted, but the script has been both literally and metaphorically flipped this week as Throwing Fits dials in a true beacon of positivity, ALLCAPSTUDIO’s Saeed Ferguson. Saeed joins the boys for a hearty meat and potatoes discussion up top, touching on a variety of necessary topics including, but not limited to: pivoting from photography to streetwear, growing up in north Philly, the racial politics of working retail, battling against freelancer rates, his real-time meteoric rise, how to design a best in class charity tee, the life and times of a gamer, west coast dreams and much more on this innovative and infectiously optimistic episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
